mapper.select: select a.KEY, a.VAL, a.KEYDESC, a.DATATYPE, a.DEMODATA, a.DATADATE from EXHAUSTBDATA a inner join ( select max(DATADATE) as DATADATE, KEY as key, DATATYPE as dataType, DEMODATA as demoData from EXHAUSTBDATA group by KEY,DATATYPE,DEMODATA ) b on a.DATADATE = b.DATADATE and a.KEY = b.KEY and a.DATATYPE = b.DATATYPE and a.DEMODATA = b.DEMODATA
